title: My dream ship
text: I can't beleive my luck, I just found a rocket ship, I've wanted one of these for as long as I can remember.
Quickly I do the math on if I'm able to repair it with what I have on hand, as there doesn't look to be many materials on this planet to help.
Jackpot, I am! Quickly I remove everything from my old ship, and disassemble everything for parts.
Not long into my repairs I realise I have made the biggest mistake of my life, I dont have enough parts to fix the thrusters. I was too excited and miscalculated what I needed.
My mind starts to race. I am going to be stuck here, forever?
With my old ship in parts and the new one mostly repaired, I have no choice but to try find what I need to fix one of them.
